author: Source: San Jose Mercury News
title: Three shot, 1 killed, gunman sought on Sacramento college campus - San Jose Mercury News
text:
Police say three people have been shot and one of them has died near a baseball field on the campus of Sacramento City College. Police say the campus is on lockdown Thursday night while they search for a suspect with no shirt wearing cargo shorts.
Start the conversation, or Read more at San Jose Mercury News.
